plot: As the life mission of one man to free education for all ages comes to its completion, he publicly reveals to the world why he did it all despite the terrible life it inflicted upon him.
plot_en: As the life mission of one man to free education for all ages comes to its completion, he publicly reveals to the world why he did it all despite the terrible life it inflicted upon him.
plot_es: As the life mission of one man to free education for all ages comes to its completion, he publicly reveals to the world why he did it all despite the terrible life it inflicted upon him.
title: Independence Year 4 Kidz
